verses.name: Jeremiah 9:18
verses.text: And let them make haste, and take up a wailing for us, that our eyes may run down with tears, and our eyelids gush out with waters.

verses.name: Jeremiah 9:19
verses.text: For a voice of wailing is heard out of Zion, How are we spoiled! we are greatly confounded, because we have forsaken the land, because our dwellings have cast us out.

verses.name: Jeremiah 9:20
verses.text: Yet hear the word of the Lord, O ye women, and let your ear receive the word of his mouth, and teach your daughters wailing, and every one her neighbour lamentation.
